name: @o6/firebase
description: A wrapper around the Firebase JS SDK with firestore and realtime database support for filtering sorting, limiting, error handling, and success scenarios

scripts.release: pnpm run bump-version && pnpm publish --access=public --tag=latest || true && git reset HEAD~1 || true
scripts.test: shx cp ../../.babelrc ../../jest.config.js . && dotenv -- jest --coverage --verbose --runInBand --forceExit && rimraf .babelrc jest.config.js
